title.value: HiFormer: Hierarchical Multi-scale Representations Using Transformers for Medical Image Segmentation
title.quote: HiFormer: Hierarchical Multi-scale Representations Using Transformers for Medical Image Segmentation

extractions.description: The paper introduces HiFormer, a novel method that integrates convolutional neural networks (CNNs) and transformers for medical image segmentation. The method leverages a CNN-based encoder and Swin Transformer to capture both global and local features and employs a Double-Level Fusion (DLF) module to effectively merge these features. The paper presents the effectiveness of HiFormer across various medical image segmentation datasets.

type.justification: The study involves extensive experiments on various medical image segmentation datasets to demonstrate the effectiveness of the proposed HiFormer model.
type.quote: Extensive experiments on various medical image segmentation datasets demonstrate the effectiveness of HiFormer over other CNN-based, transformer-based, and hybrid methods in terms of computational complexity, quantitative and qualitative results.
